tabletopGames.author: Holger Bösch
tabletopGames.detail: Black Stories is a game for 12+ from 2 to 15 players who take around 20 minutes to one game. The rules are simple, the master of the game read the story then other players have to guess how it happened
tabletopGames.sumup: The time of a game, become an investigator and solve those black stories.
tabletopGames.title: Black Stories

tabletopGames.author: Piotr Krzystek & Łukasz Wrona
tabletopGames.detail: Byle do pierwszego is a game for 14+ from 2 to 5 players who take around 40 minutes to one game. The rules are simple, we chose how many months we wish to play and we have to pay the bills by the end of each month
tabletopGames.sumup: For a time return to PRL, now it is time to pay the bills.
tabletopGames.title: Byle do Pierwszego

tabletopGames.author: Klaus-Jürgen Wrede
tabletopGames.detail: Carcassonne is a game for 7+ from 2 to 5 players who take around 40 minutes to one game. The rules are simple, you have to place tiles with road, city, and church. Then to place figurines in order to control them.
tabletopGames.sumup: Did you hear of the city Carcassonne? well nothing in common, just build roads and cities to control.
tabletopGames.title: Carcassonne

tabletopGames.author: Klaus Teuber
tabletopGames.detail: Catan is a game for 10+ from 3 to 4 players who take around 90 minutes to one game. The rules may look complicated however, basically, you will try to get resources (by exploiting or trading) to build your settlement.
tabletopGames.title: Catan

tabletopGames.author: Bruno Cathala & Ludovic Maublanc
tabletopGames.detail: The Cyclades is a game for 14+ from 2 to 5 players who take around 60 minutes to one game. It is very nice to play with friends. The aim is to build (or take over) 2 metropolises; to do so, you will have to manage your soldiers, your navy, your economy, and which god to venerate
tabletopGames.sumup: Compete to be the one to build your empire of 2 metropolises.
tabletopGames.title: Cyclades

tabletopGames.author: Bruno Cathala & Ludovic Maublanc
tabletopGames.detail: The Cyclades: hades is an extension of Cyclades, then the Cyclades is needed (c.f. Cyclades description). It adds hades has a god, some creatures, objects, and heroes. With hades as a god, you will control the undead for a turn. This extension is a game-changer.
tabletopGames.sumup: An enjoyable extension to the Cyclades.
tabletopGames.title: Cyclades: Hades

tabletopGames.author: 2 Pionki
tabletopGames.detail: Czółko: Bez Cenzury is a game for 18+ from 2 to 8 players who take around 30 minutes to one game. The rules are simple, you should use silly moves, accents, and weird performances to convey the word or phrase on the card that’s on your friend's head to help him or her guess it!
tabletopGames.sumup: You have a card on your head has everybody you have to guess it and help others to guess their.
tabletopGames.title: Czółko: Bez Cenzury

tabletopGames.author: Matthew Inman, Elan Lee & Shane Small
tabletopGames.detail: Exploding Kitten is a game for 7+ from 2 to 5 players who take around 15 minutes to one game. The rules are simple, be the one who doesn't explode.
tabletopGames.sumup: Ask for favors, attack friends, see the future- whatever it takes to avoid exploding!
tabletopGames.title: Exploding Kitten

tabletopGames.author: Andrew Fischer & Nathan I. Hajek
tabletopGames.detail: Fallout is a game for 14+ from 1 to 4 players who take around 150 minutes to one game. The rules are a bit complicated, in short in order to win you will have either to max your personal influence or your faction influence.
tabletopGames.sumup: Find allies, skills, and equipment as you chuck dice through the nuclear apocalypse.
tabletopGames.title: Fallout

tabletopGames.author: Andrew Fischer
tabletopGames.detail: Fallout Shelter is a game for 14+ from 2 to 4 players who take around 60 minutes to one game. The rules are simple: you have to place your dweller to gather resources, build room and fight with threats. The winner will be the one who has the most happiness points.
tabletopGames.sumup: Who will become the best Overseer ?
tabletopGames.title: Fallout Shelter

tabletopGames.author: POZnan
tabletopGames.detail: Monopoly Poznań is a game for 8+ from 2 to 6 players who take around 90 minutes to one game. The aim is simple, become the richest and make other players bankrupt.
tabletopGames.sumup: Like regular Monopoly but in Poznań
tabletopGames.title: Monopoly Poznań

tabletopGames.author: Michael Sistrunk
tabletopGames.detail: 5 Sekund: Bez Cenzury is a game for 18+ from 2 to 30 players who take between 15 and  60 minutes to one game. The rules are simple, you have 5 seconds to reply to a card. Spoiler alert, there are ambiguous allusions.
tabletopGames.title: 5 Sekund: Bez Cenzury

tabletopGames.author: Rory O'Connor
tabletopGames.detail: Rory's Story Cubes: Primal is a game for 6+ from 1 to ♾ players who take the time you decide. The rules are simple: roll the dices and invent a story fitting the dices. No winner no loser.
tabletopGames.sumup: Since the beginning of languages, people met to tell stories
tabletopGames.title: Rory's Story Cubes: Primal

tabletopGames.author: Marcin Minor
tabletopGames.detail: Sen is a game for 8+ from 2 to 5 players who take around 20 minutes to one game. The rules are simple: you have 4 cards you don't know in front of you, at the beginning you can have a look at 2 of them. Your aim? Having the least points.
tabletopGames.sumup: In the world of dreams, you wish to have the least crows (points) possible.
tabletopGames.title: Sen

tabletopGames.author: Jacob Fryxelius
tabletopGames.detail: Terraforming Mars is a game for 12+ from 1 to 5 players who take around 120 minutes to one game. The rules can be a bit hard to apprehend. The aim is to develop your colony to complete the terraformation of Mars.
tabletopGames.sumup: Compete with rival CEOs to make Mars habitable and build your corporate empire.
tabletopGames.title: Terraforming Mars

tabletopGames.author: Merle Robbins
tabletopGames.detail: Uno is a game for 7+ from 2 to 10 players who take around 30 minutes to one game. The rules are simple: you need to get rid of your cards first.
tabletopGames.sumup: Get rid of your cards first, but don't forget to say "UNO!"
tabletopGames.title: Uno

tabletopGames.author: Unstable Games
tabletopGames.detail: Unstable unicorns is a game for 8+ from 2 to 8 players who takes between 30 and 60 minutes to play, you will have so much fun and emotion playing this game. Your aim looks simple: having 7 unicorns in your stable, simple, isn't it?
tabletopGames.sumup: "Build a unicorn army. Betray your friends. Unicorns are your friends now"
tabletopGames.title: Unstable Unicorns

tabletopGames.author: Unstable Games
tabletopGames.detail: Unstable unicorns is a game for 18+ from 2 to 8 players who takes between 30 and 60 minutes to play, you will have so fun and ask yourself lot of questions playing this game. Your aim still looks simple: having 7 unicorns in your stable, simple, isn't it?
tabletopGames.sumup: "Horrify your friends. Abandon them. Unicorns don't judge."
tabletopGames.title: Unstable Unicorns NSFW
